授業目的: The microeconomics aims to describe the rational mechanism of the resource’s allocation in market under the legal framework of international or domestic society. The basic concepts of proper choices taken by the economic agents, such as consumer (Household), producer (Private Entity) and the state (Government), are studied in this course.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the concepts of microeconomics e.g., mechanism of optimization of economic transactions and the role of market. Concurrently, they are invited to acquire some technical knowledge on statistics, theory of games, economy of energy and environment, service economy etc. to let them tackle the economic issues in the future global society.
